item.title: MN City ‘Likely Disposed Of’ 21 Ballots In Race Decided For Dem Candidate By 14 Votes
item.description: Two close state House races flipped from Republicans to Democrats, and one of those races has missing ballots.

item.title: Democrat Activists Exploit Tragic Miscarriages Like Mine To Sell Abortions
item.description: Unlike miscarriage, abortion directly and intentionally kills an innocent child who is living, growing, and developing.

item.title: Lori Chavez-DeRemer Would Be A Disaster As Labor Secretary
item.description: Republicans should take the side of their own voters instead of listening to decadent union goons like Sean O’Brien.

item.title: How ‘Gladiator II’ Rejected Masculinity
item.description: In 'Gladiator,' Maximus embodied masculinity in the highest order. In 'Gladiator II,' masculinity is treated like a bad joke.

item.title: Netflix’s ‘Joy’ Shows Early Fears About The Moral Fallout Of IVF Were Justified
item.description: 'Joy' not only diminishes the earliest anxieties about IVF but seeks to mask them under a dramatized, one-sided version of a feel-good story.
